title: The Fiddler
credit_line: Gift of the Richard King Mellon Foundation
provenance_text:
Alexander McIlwaine, Pittsburgh, PA, by 1859; Alice T. and Jean M. McGirr, Pittsburgh, PA, by 1932; Mrs. Edward Casey, Pittsburgh, PA, 1948; Harry Shaw Newman Gallery, New York, NY, 1948; Richard King Mellon Foundation, Pittsburgh, PA, 1950; Gift of the Richard King Mellon Foundation, October 1972.

Updated and under review by CGK.

creator.birth_place: East Liverpool (Columbiana county, Ohio, United States)
